title: A nonstop Kentucky prayer 'revival' is going viral on TikTok, and people are traveling thousands of miles to take part
description: A Kentucky college chapel service has ballooned into a non-stop prayer and worship session that some are calling a ‘revival.’

title: Tesla will open part of electric vehicle charging network to other drivers, White House says
description: Tesla will open a portion of its electric vehicle charging stations to drivers of other vehicles by the end of next year, the White House said.

title: How one teen is urging legislators in Washington state to help protect kids from being exploited on vlogs
description: A Washington state teenager is advocating for a bill to protect the privacy of the children of influencers.
